name: hotel-booking-worker
description: Cloudflare Workers API for hotel booking requests with AlpineBits integration

scripts.db:reset:local: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:import:local
scripts.db:list:local: wrangler d1 execute hotel-booking-db --local --command 'SELECT * FROM hotels ORDER BY id'
scripts.db:list:remote: wrangler d1 execute hotel-booking-db --remote --command 'SELECT * FROM hotels ORDER BY id'
scripts.db:count:local: wrangler d1 execute hotel-booking-db --local --command 'SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM hotels'
scripts.db:count:remote: wrangler d1 execute hotel-booking-db --remote --command 'SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM hotels'
